CorrectAnswerExercises.Description: Great job! Stand up and lean to stretch 5 times on each side !
Excellent! Get up, take 10 deep breaths and stretch your arms above your head.
Well done! Do 5 push-ups or wall push-ups if needed.
Perfect! Hold a plank position for as long as you can.
Outstanding! Do 15 squats - you've earned this challenge!
Amazing! Run in place for 1 minutes at good intensity.

WrongAnswerExercises.Description: Oops! Walk around your room 5 times to get those brain cells moving.
Not quite! Do get up and jump 5 times.
Close, but not quite! Do 10 jumping jacks to boost your energy.
Try again next time! March in place for 90 seconds.
Tough question! Do 20 heigh knee jacks as a reward !
No worries! Jump 10 times on each side (total 20) as if you were wearing skies (ski hops) !
